Overview For gstSphere Members Chapter

S

double S( const gstPoint& P ) ;

Outside flag.

P
Surface function.

dist_to_T

double dist_to_T( gstPoint& P ) ;

Surface gradient.

P
Tangent plane surface function.

get_on_S

gstPoint get_on_S( gstPoint& P0 ) ;

Tangent plane surface function.

P0
Find closed point on surface.

get_on_T

gstPoint get_on_T( gstPoint& P0 ) ;

Find closed point on surface.

P0
Find closest pt on tangent plane.

grad_S

gstVector grad_S( gstPoint& P ) ;

Surface function.

P
Surface gradient.
